title: Central Barcelona Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Welcome Drink
description:
Styled by local designer Jaime Beriestain, this central sensation champions showstopping contemporary decor. Guests can savour plant-focused plates at Virens restaurant, decompress with treatments at the onsite wellness area or sip sangria at Azimuth Rooftop Bar, surrounded by the shimmering rooftop pool and endless sunshine.

Located just steps from the iconic Passeig de Gracia, Spain's answer to the Champs-Elysees, Almanac Barcelona's prime location offers easy access to premium shopping, Gaudi's architectural masterpieces and the historic streets of Ciutat Vella (the Old Town). The city's foodie haven, La Boqueria market, as well as the iconic Barceloneta beach, are both just a short drive away.
offer_address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes 619-621, Barcelona 08007, Spain

title: W Barcelona: Five-star Beachfront Glamour
description: You're probably already familiar with the world-famous W Bali Seminyak and glamorous W Koh Samui, but allow us to introduce you to Spain's ultra-stylish and artsy W Barcelona - rated one of the '25 Best Hotels in Barcelona' by Condé Nast Traveler 2018. Taking five-star glamour to new levels, you can experience three nights of beachfront luxury on the world-renowned Sant Sebastià Beach including daily buffet breakfast with over 130 items to choose from and access to a rooftop pool and restaurant led by a Michelin-starred chef.
offer_address: Plaça Rosa dels Vents, 1 - Passeig Joan de Borbo, Ciutat Vella, 08039 Barcelona, Spain

title: Charming Barcelona Old Town Stay with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Bar & Half-Day Tour Upgrades Available
description:
Perched where Barcelona meets the Mediterranean, this stay feels more like a curator's masterpiece than a hotel, with a light-flooded atrium and rooms brimming with artistic flair. The rooftop pool melts into the horizon, while Mare Nostrum rooftop bar serves sunset tapas and craft cocktails against a backdrop of sailboat masts and Gothic spires.

Lose yourself in the labyrinthine charm of the Old Town's secret squares, dive into El Born's treasure trove of designer boutiques or follow the scent of fresh seafood to Port Vell's waterfront restaurants. Whether you're sinking your toes into Barceloneta's golden sand or exploring hidden wine bars in centuries-old cellars, Barcelona's most coveted destinations are at your doorstep.
offer_address: 9 Pas de Sota Muralla, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona 08003, Spain

title: Boutique Barcelona Stay in Central Gothic Quarter with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Bar & Jacuzzi
description:
Discover Barcelona's Gothic Quarter gem, a boutique retreat exuding timeless charm with a stylish rooftop terrace, relaxing jacuzzi and epic city panoramas. Just steps away from Las Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and the magnificent Barcelona Cathedral, H10 Montcada provides the perfect base for discovering the city's cultural treasures.

Scope out some of the city's finest tapas bars on Passeig del Born or hop across town to Carrer de Blai for an authentic pintxo tasting experience. End your day with an evening cocktail at the intimate Sunset Lounge Rooftop Bar, soaking in the ambiance after exploring Barcelona's enchanting city streets.
offer_address: Via Laietana 24, Barrio Gótico, Barcelona 08003, Spain

title: Deluxe Boutique Hotel in the Heart of Barcelona
description: Escape to Spain’s coolest city, Barcelona and stay in style at the fabulous boutique H10 Cubik - located right in the centre of the city. Stay three nights and enjoy a complimentary upgrade to a City View Classic Room with daily buffet and a la carte breakfasts and a welcome drink on arrival for two.

title: Heritage Barcelona Retreat Steps from Passeig de Gracia with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Craft new memories at this heritage hotel in the centre of vibrant Barcelona with a stay at H10 Urquinaona Plaza. Take it all in with the city at your fingertips - this contemporary escape sits between the Gothic Quarter and Dreta de l'Eixample, perfect for visits to iconic sites like La Sagrada Familia and Passeig de Gracia. Experience a warm welcome with a drink and treat on arrival, enjoy a complimentary buffet breakfast before a day of exploration or visit the rooftop where a refreshing plunge pool awaits.

Housed in a beautifully renovated 19th-century building, the hotel seamlessly blends modern style with the city's storied past. From winding medieval streets to bustling beach promenades, discover the essence of Barcelona in this chic urban sanctuary.

title: Chic Stay in Barcelona’s Upmarket Eixample District
description: Stay in the heart of Barcelona’s iconic Eixample District with a getaway at the Evenia Rosselló Hotel. The cosmopolitan capital of Spain’s Catalonia region offers beautiful architecture, buzzing shopping streets and some of the country’s best bars and restaurants. Included in your escape is daily breakfast, a welcome bottle of Cava on arrival and a delicious tapas dinner (including a drink each) for two.

title: Spain Contemporary Retreat in the Heart of Barcelona with Daily Breakfast
description:
An indulgent urban escape awaits at the modern and sophisticated H10 Cubik, found in the heart of bustling Barcelona. Boasting a geometric and colourful design, showcased in the hotel's public areas as well as their sun-soaked and generously-sized guest rooms, this comfortable retreat promises the ultimate Spain experience. Savour Spanish tapas at Atik Restaurant or indulge in light dishes and cocktails at the lobby's Robotik Bar. When the sun sets, head upstairs to the rooftop Atik Terrace and sip your favourite tipple beside the refreshing infinity pool while soaking in striking vistas of Barcelona.

In your free time, embark on an expedition to discover this bold city, passing heritage sites such as Plaza de Catalunya - a quick four-minute walk away - or shopping hubs like the famous Passeig de Gracia. Within 10 minutes by car, you'll reach the iconic La Sagrada Familia, a stunning slice of still-unfinished history.

title: Prestigious Barcelona Escape with Daily Breakfast, Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Iconic Rooftop Pool
description:
Coined 'the hotel with a thousand eyes', Ohla Barcelona is instantly recognisable by its striking facade: the neoclassical design has been hijacked by sculptor Frederic Amat, who pinned hundreds of ceramic eyes on the hotel's front. The extravagant tone set by the exterior continues throughout your stay, with facilities that ensure your experience is equal parts comfortable and exciting. 

Indulge in a swim at the clear-sided rooftop swimming pool, savour a meal at Michelin-starred French restaurant from Romain Fornell or relax at the iconic rooftop terrace listed among the best rooftop bars in Barcelona by The Rooftop Guide, with a cocktail bar shaking up excellent concoctions and aperitifs.

Found in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, just five minutes from La Rambla and the famous Boqueria market, this five-star hotel is surrounded by a vibrant array of restaurants, shops, bars and cafes right outside its door.

title: Five-Star Barcelona Luxury with Daily À La Carte Breakfast
description:
Awe-inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and world-revered cuisine: it’s all on offer in the Spanish seaside city of Barcelona. Stay right in the heart of the action at the five-star The One Barcelona, located in one of the city’s most exclusive neighbourhoods. This luxurious haven - complete with a stylish rooftop bar - is the perfect base for exploring the city.

Enjoy daily à la carte breakfast and a welcome bottle of wine and chocolates on arrival.

**Travelling to Europe?** [Browse our Europe Collection](https://luxuryescapes.com/au/destinations/europe).

title: Central Barcelona Gothic Quarter Glamour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Wine Hour
description:
Nestled in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, this five-star urban hotel is an ultra-refined hideaway perfectly situated to experience the best parts of Barcelona. Just steps away from La Rambla, you're surrounded by the city's finest boutique bars, restaurants and retail stores, putting indulgent cuisine and limitless shopping right on your doorstep.

Visitors come here to experience Barcelona like a local. Opt to mingle at the rooftop bar, savour Mediterranean meals at Fauna restaurant or lounge by the pool with views of the vibrant streets below. This glamorous hotel also offers an onsite spa, a yoga program and soundproof rooms, ensuring a restful recovery after days spent exploring the lively city.
location_description: Kimpton Vividora Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Carrer del Duc 15, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona 08002, Spain

title: Elegant Barcelona City Escape with Michelin-Star Restaurant, Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the essence of understated luxury at this city retreat in one of Barcelona's most iconic squares at the foot of Montjuïc Castle. This five-star oasis of contemporary design invites you to lose yourself in this historic city, with spectacular views over Barcelona offered from its rooftop and in each stylish room.

Delight in exquisite cuisine at Michelin-starred Quirat Restaurant, with a seasonal menu of signature Spanish dishes, savour bespoke cocktails at Gebre Bar or enjoy the panoramic vistas from 173 Rooftop Terrace beside the hotel's sparkling pool.

Experience unparalleled comfort in thoughtfully curated guest rooms, each designed with both elegance and modern comfort in mind. Whether you're travelling for business or leisure, a stay at the InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel is set to make your stay in this vibrant city unforgettable.
offer_address: Avenida de Rius i Taulet, 1-3, 08004, Barcelona, Spain

title: Trendy Barcelona Escape Minutes from La Rambla with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Live the Spanish dream in the vibrant heart of Barcelona with a stay at the H10 Casanova. Return from a day of exploring to enjoy a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool as you sip on an afternoon cocktail at the Sky Bar. Treat yourself even further and sink into a world of relaxation at the Despacio Spa with pampering body treatments from aromatherapy massages to regenerating body wraps. Then, finish off your day with a sumptuous Spanish meal at Mediterrani restaurant, before retreating to the comfort of the elegant rooms.

This chic hotel is mere minutes from the city's most fantastic sites and experiences, including the La Rambla street markets, the Cathedral of Barcelona, and Ciutadella Park where rowboats are dotted over the surface of the charming central lake.
offer_address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 559, L'Eixample, 08011 Barcelona, Spain

title: Prestigious Barcelona Escape with Daily Breakfast, Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Coined 'the hotel with a thousand eyes', this hotel's neoclassical design has been hijacked by sculptor Frederic Amat, who pinned hundreds of ceramic eyes on its front. The extravagant tone set by the exterior continues throughout your stay, with facilities that ensure your experience is equal parts comfortable and exciting.

Indulge in a swim at the clear-sided rooftop swimming pool, savour a meal at Michelin-starred French restaurant from Romain Fornell or relax at the rooftop terrace with its celebrated bar shaking up excellent concoctions and aperitifs. Found in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, this five-star hotel is surrounded by a vibrant array of restaurants, shops, bars and cafes.

vendor_name: Grand Hotel Central - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Barcelona City Break with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Unlock the secrets of Barcelona's enchanting Old Town with an indulgent stay right in the centre of it all. Recently renovated and reopened in 2024, Grand Hotel Central's new design combines history and character with an inviting and cutting-edge decor by London design studio Sagrada. With a stylish rooftop bar, restaurant and pool area overlooking the bustling city, you can go from Mediterranean tapas to a sun-kissed cocktail or a dip in the sparkling infinity pool as you please. Offering delectable Spanish cuisine and regular rooftop DJ sets, take in the city's lively atmosphere while watching the sun set, or treat yourself at the onsite spa before discovering all of the city's delights.

When you're ready to explore, you couldn't be in a better location to wander the streets of Barcelona's iconic Gothic Quarter. With countless shops, attractions and museums right on your doorstep, you don't need to venture far to experience Spain's laidback atmosphere and rich culture.
offer_address: 30 Via Laietana, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona 08003, Spain

title: Five-Star Barcelona Escape with Iconic Rooftop Pool, Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Daily Breakfast
description:
Coined 'the hotel with a thousand eyes', Ohla Barcelona is instantly recognisable by its striking facade: the neoclassical design has been hijacked by sculptor Frederic Amat, who pinned hundreds of ceramic eyes on the hotel's front. Found in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, just five minutes from La Rambla and the famous Boqueria market, the five-star hotel couldn't be more conveniently located with an abundance of restaurants, shops, bars and cafes right outside its door.

The extravagant tone set by the exterior continues throughout your stay, with red-hot facilities ensuring an experience that's equal parts comfortable and exciting. There's a clear-sided rooftop swimming pool, a Michelin-starred French restaurant from Romain Fornell and an iconic rooftop terrace listed among the best rooftop bars in Barcelona by The Rooftop Guide, with a cocktail bar shaking up excellent concoctions and aperitifs.

vendor_name: HOTEL INDIGO BARCELONA GRANVIA PLAZA ESPANA
title: Boutique Barcelona Escape near Plaza Espana with Daily Breakfast & Tapas Bar
description:
Immerse yourself in the heart and soul of Barcelona with a high-end stay in the vibrant Sants-Montjuïc district, moments from iconic Plaza España. This modern lifestyle hotel draws inspiration from the rich industrial and artistic heritage of the neighbourhood, seamlessly blending into the urban landscape with vibrant colours that reflect the energy of the city. When you're not lounging in your lavish room, enjoy reimagined Catalan tapas, exquisitely crafted cocktails and live music at Reversible tapas bar, before exploring all that the city has to offer.

At Hotel Indigo Barcelona Gran Vía Plaza España, an IHG Hotel, you are perfectly located to explore the history, art and culture of the charming city. With the Museum of National Art, Magic Montjuïc Fountain and Montjuïc Park right on your doorstep, you don't have go far to discover local attractions, while bustling Sant Antoni and Poble-Sec neighbourhoods offer a multitude of both traditional and modern bars, cafes and restaurants to satify the tastebuds.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes 322, Barcelona 08004, Spain

title: Central Barcelona City Break near Passeig de Gracia with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the effervescent allure of Barcelona from the heart of the city at 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellón Hotel, a boutique sanctuary of style and comfort. Perfectly positioned for exploration, the hotel is a stroll from the architectural marvel of Sagrada Familia and the captivating Picasso Museum. Immerse yourself in the culinary wonderland of Mercat de la Boqueria, a vibrant marketplace brimming with fresh produce and local delicacies. Wander through the Gothic Quarter's labyrinth of cobblestoned lanes, dotted with tapas bars, boutique stores and fine jewellery dealers.

When you're not out exploring, retreat to your comfortable room or indulge in a refreshing rooftop swim at the hotel pool. Here, the panoramic views overlooking the city are particularly striking at sunset, as the blazing Mediterranean sun transforms the sky into an artwork of burnt orange. Grab a bite to eat at the onsite cafe each morning, choosing from a selection of fresh buffet favourites, including pastries and fresh seasonal fruits.

title: Central Barcelona Gothic Quarter Glamour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Wine Hour
description:
Nestled in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, this five-star urban oasis is an ultra-refined hideaway perfectly situated for exploring the best parts of Barcelona. Just steps from La Rambla, you'll be surrounded by the city's finest boutique bars, restaurants and retail stores, putting indulgent cuisine and limitless shopping right on your doorstep.

Visitors come here to experience Barcelona like a local. Opt to mingle at the rooftop bar, savour Mediterranean meals at Fauna restaurant or lounge by the pool with views of the vibrant streets below. This glamorous hotel also offers an onsite spa and a daily sunrise yoga program, ensuring a restful recovery after days spent exploring the lively city.
location_description: Kimpton Vividora Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Carrer del Duc 15, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona 08002, Spain

vendor_name: HOTEL INDIGO BARCELONA GRANVIA PLAZA ESPANA
title: Barcelona Contemporary Urban Escape near Plaza Espana with Daily Breakfast & Stylish Tapas Bar
description:
Immerse yourself in the soul of Barcelona with a stay in the vibrant Sants-Montjuic district, moments from Plaza Espana. This modern hotel draws inspiration from the city's industrial and artistic heritage, seamlessly blending into the urban landscape with vibrant interiors.

When you're not lounging in your room, enjoy reimagined Catalan tapas and cocktails at Reversible tapas bar, before exploring the city. The bustling Sant Antoni and Poble-Sec neighbourhoods offer both traditional and modern bars, cafes and restaurants.

At this stylish urban haven, you are perfectly located to explore. With the Museum of National Art, Montjuic Magic Fountain and Montjuic Park right on your doorstep, you don't have to go far to discover local attractions.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes 322, Barcelona 08004, Spain

title: Cosmopolitan Barcelona Hideaway near Sagrada Familia with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Nestled in the vibrant heart of one of the city's most emerging districts, this stylish escape captures Barcelona's dynamic spirit. With soaring arches, curved wood designs and distinctive peach-plastered walls, this building combines modern design elements with a tribute to the area's rich past.

Chill out by the pool with unbeatable vistas of Barcelona rooftops, grab a bite at Tope or Four Corners restaurant where tacos and Detroit-style pizza are always on the menu, or check out the basement space that's normally buzzing with art shows and social events. This retreat exudes an urban cool that feels more like a creative community than a conventional hotel.

As well as offering easy access to both beaches and landmarks, The Hoxton, Poblenou places you in a neighbourhood brimming with local flavour. Nearby Rambla de Poblenou is packed with authentic bistros and great watering holes. Stroll a little further and you'll find less crowded beaches for a peaceful getaway from the city buzz.

title: Boutique Escape in Central Barcelona
description: Experience the culture, romance and dreamy architecture of Spain’s coolest city, Barcelona. Spend three nights at the H10 Metropolitan-named the Best City Hotel in Spain by Condé Nast Traveler and stamped with a TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence-and enjoy decadent daily buffet breakfast, welcome drinks for two on arrival, welcome in-room wine and chocolate and 20% discount at Eden Bar to enjoy throughout your stay.

title: Boutique Barcelona Stay in Central Gothic Quarter with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Bar & Jacuzzi
description:
Get a taste of Mediterranean city living with an escape to this boutique sanctuary in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter. Complete with a sun-drenched jacuzzi and epic city panoramas, the stylish Sunset Lounge Rooftop Bar calls for cocktails and light bites in the sun, while the hotel's coveted location places you just steps from the city's best attractions.

Wind your way through the quaint alleyways of the Ciutat Vella, drop by the iconic Picasso Museum or Barcelona Cathedral, and end with tasty tapas and local cava at one of many trendy bars and restaurants in the area. The best of Barcelona is right at your fingertips.
offer_address: Via Laietana 24, Barrio Gótico, Barcelona 08003, Spain

title: Boutique Barcelona Escape Just Off Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Pool
description:
Wake from dream-filled siestas to wander Spain's famous city of art and architecture with a luxurious stay at Gallery Hotel Barcelona. Ideally placed in the centre of the action, this stylish retreat is moments from the iconic Passeig de Gracia and the architectural marvels of Gaudí. Between rounds of moreish pintxos, indulge in delectable Mediterranean dishes fuelled by seasonal ingredients at the hotel's chic Sintonia restaurant. Spend relaxed afternoons overlooking the glorious city from the hotel's pool or watch the sun turn glorious shades of orange with a refreshing cocktail in hand at the rooftop bar, The TOP.

After adventuring through the city, from the historic Gothic Quarter to the bustling Las Ramblas and the stunning Sagrada Familia, rejuvenate with a session in the hotel's fully equipped fitness centre or cosy sauna. On your final day, sleep in and spend the morning as you please with guaranteed 2pm checkout.
offer_address: Carrer del Rosselló, 249, L'eixample, Barcelona 08008, Spain

title: Boutique Barcelona Glamour near Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast & Heated Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Five-star comforts surrounded by some of Barcelona's most iconic landmarks await at this chic boutique hotel, just minutes away from some of Gaudí's revered masterpieces such as Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Familia.

The hotel itself is a treasure trove of elevated comforts, with an exquisite restaurant onsite serving locally caught seafood sourced daily from the city’s fish markets. On sunny afternoons, head up to the rooftop, where a glorious heated infinity pool, bar and terrace promise fabulous views of the city's most famous sites.

Right outside the hotel's doors, you'll find a plethora of restaurants, shops and cafes - to be expected from the coolest neighbourhood in the world, as heralded by Time Out Magazine. When you aren't marvelling at masterful architecture, your central location leaves you a stone's throw from La Pedrera and Passeig de Gracia.
offer_address: Carrer de Còrsega 289, L'Eixample 08008, Barcelona, Spain

title: Chic Boutique Hotel in the Heart of Barcelona
description: Calling all trendsetting travellers. Experience Barcelona in style with three nights at the Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona. Feel like a VIP with a guaranteed room upgrade, mingle with the city’s glamorous ‘it’ crowd with a complimentary welcome drink each on the super chic rooftop terrace or lobby bar, wake up to daily buffet breakfasts made from locally-sourced market fresh produce and enjoy a special welcome amenity for two.

title: Five-Star Barcelona City Retreat on Iconic Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description: Brimming with old-world charm and dripping with golden splendour, a five-star stay at the sumptuous Almanac Barcelona cannot disappoint. Located just steps from the iconic Passeig de Gracia, Spain's answer to the Champs-Elysees, the hotel, styled by local designer Jaime Beriestain, champions showstopping contemporary decor. After a day spent admiring Gaudi’s masterpieces and exploring the historic streets of the old city, allow yourself to follow Barcelona's inimitable rhythm - enjoy plant-focused plates at Michelin-featured Virens, wellness treatments at the onsite spa or sip sangria at Azimuth Rooftop Bar, surrounded by the shimmering rooftop pool and the endless Catalonian skyline.
offer_address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes 619-621, Barcelona 08007, Spain

vendor_name: Grand Hotel Central - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
title: Elegant Barcelona City Break with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:

With a stylish rooftop bar, restaurant and pool area overlooking the bustling city, you can go from Mediterranean tapas to a sun-kissed cocktail or a dip in the sparkling infinity pool as you please. When you’re ready to explore, you couldn’t be in a better location to wander the streets of Barcelona’s iconic Old Town. With countless shops, attractions and museums right on your doorstep, you don’t need to venture far to experience Spain’s laidback atmosphere and rich culture.

title: Heritage Barcelona Retreat Steps from Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience the vibrant charm of Barcelona from this beautifully restored 19th-century building just moments from the Gothic Quarter. Boasting modern interiors and elegant Novecentista details, the hotel seamlessly blends contemporary style with the city’s storied past.

With the iconic Old Town, Passeig de Gracia high street and Las Ramblas all at your fingertips, you’re perfectly positioned to discover the lively atmosphere and vibrant culture of the city. Teeming with cosy tapas bars and a mix of Spanish and Catalan cuisine, you can delight the tastebuds along the way.

In between exploring Barcelona’s sights and attractions, the hotel offers an idyllic setting and plenty of spaces to unwind. Retreat to the quiet outdoor garden or opt for the Lluna Terrace for a cocktail, a dip in the plunge pool and panoramic views over the city.

title: Central Barcelona Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Cocktails & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Styled by local designer Jaime Beriestain, the Almanac Barcelona champions showstopping contemporary decor. Guests can savour plant-focused plates at Virens restaurant, decompress with wellness treatments at the onsite spa or sip sangria at Azimuth Rooftop Bar, surrounded by the shimmering rooftop pool and endless sunshine.

Located just steps from the iconic Passeig de Gracia, Spain's answer to the Champs-Elysees, this hotel's prime location offers easy access to premium shopping, Gaudi's architectural masterpieces and the historic streets of Ciutat Vella (the Old Town). The city's foodie haven, La Boqueria market, as well as the iconic Barceloneta beach, are both just a short drive away.
offer_address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes 619-621, Barcelona 08007, Spain

title: Chic Barcelona Modernist Escape on Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast
description:
Culture, awe-inspiring architecture, world-class art, history and delicious cuisine: it’s all on offer in the sparkling seaside city of Barcelona - and you're invited to stay in the heart of it all on the 'Spanish Champs-Elysees'.

Housed in a 19th-century building with a modernist facade, this boutique gem offers a collection of rooms decorated in a chic contemporary style with luxe amenities, designer furniture and an elegant lounge bar. After taking in the city's history and culture, you're in the perfect place to enjoy the delicious tapas and trendy bars of L'Eixample, Gracia and the Gothic Quarter.

You won’t have to venture far to embrace Barcelona’s cool vibes and rich history. Located on one of the city's most prominent streets, you'll find a collection of elite fashion ateliers and upscale shopping right outside your door. The hotel is situated near Gaudi’s modernist masterpieces, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera, and only a 20-minute walk from the famous Sagrada Familia.

title: Boutique City Stay in Barcelona’s Most Exclusive Neighbourhood
description: Awe-inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and world-revered cuisine: it’s all on offer in the Spanish seaside city of Barcelona, and you are invited to stay right in the heart of the action at the ultra-glamorous H10 Montcada. Housed in a neoclassical building in one of the most prominent streets in the city, this boutique hotel is the perfect launchpad to explore Barcelona. Your Spanish getaway includes daily buffet breakfast, a glass of sparkling on arrival, a welcome amenity gift and daily complimentary bottled water.

title: Heritage Barcelona Retreat Steps from Passeig de Gracia with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the vibrant charm of Barcelona from this beautifully restored 19th-century building just moments from the Gothic Quarter. Boasting modern interiors and elegant Novecentista details, the hotel seamlessly blends contemporary style with the city's storied past.

With the iconic Old Town, Passeig de Gracia high street and Las Ramblas all at your fingertips, you're perfectly positioned to discover the lively atmosphere and vibrant culture of the city. title: Five-Star Barcelona Escape Just Moments from Passeig de Gracia with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Find yourself in the heart of one of Spain's trendiest neighbourhoods with a five-star stay at Ocean Drive Barcelona - a city oasis that prides itself on unique style and personalised service. Located in the bustling Eixample district, moments from outstanding restaurants, high-end boutiques and must-see cultural sites, this hotel has your Barca hit-list sorted. The sun-drenched rooftop pool and terrace are the perfect places to soak up skyline vistas with a cocktail in hand, while the generously sized Mediterranean-inspired rooms invite a restful siesta after mornings of exploration.

Stick around for one of Ocean Drive Barcelona's luxe events or step out onto the pulsing streets to discover nearby attractions - from Gaudi's architecture and the Sagrada Familia to the emblematic main square, Plaça de Catalunya - only a short stroll away.

title: Discover Barcelona From the City’s Top Neighbourhood
description: Awe-inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and world-revered cuisine: it’s all on offer in the Spanish seaside city of Barcelona, and you’re invited to stay right in the heart of the action at the top-rated, five-star The One Barcelona. Located in one of the city’s most exclusive neighbourhoods, this luxurious haven - complete with a stylish rooftop bar, is the perfect base from which to explore the city. Enjoy a guaranteed upgrade to a city-view room with daily a la carte breakfasts, a welcome drink each on arrival and a complimentary bottle of wine.

title: Five-Star Barcelona Glamour with Daily Breakfast at Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Five-star comforts surrounded by some of Barcelona's most iconic landmarks await at the boutique Ohla Eixample. Featuring a striking facade made of 1,000 pieces of carved ceramic, the hotel places you minutes from La Sagrada Familia, Casa Mila and Park Güell. The hotel itself is a treasure trove of elevated comforts, with a Michelin-starred restaurant onsite serving locally-caught seafood sourced daily from the city’s fish markets. On sunny afternoons, head up to the rooftop, where a glorious infinity pool, bar and terrace promise fabulous views of the city's most famous sites.

Right outside the hotel's doors, you'll find a plethora of restaurants, shops and cafes - to be expected from the coolest neighbourhood in the world, as heralded by Time Out Magazine. When you aren't marvelling at the masterworks of Gaudi, your central location leaves you only minutes from Barceloneta beach and the bustling Gothic Quarter.
offer_address: Carrer de Còrsega 289, L'Eixample 08008, Barcelona, Spain

title: Barcelona Boutique Art Hotel in Eixample District with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Pool Bar
description:
This ideally located hotel in the heart of Barcelona's Eixample District is an art lover's haven. Original works and lithographs by renowned artists such as Joan Miró and Miquel Barceló adorn the lobby while colourful corridors pay tribute to different contemporary artists.

Begin your adventures with a buffet and a la carte breakfast at the elegant Modern Art Restaurant. Celebrate Barcelona's 300 days of sunshine with a swim in the rooftop pool, overlooking the honeycomb alcoves of the surrounding neighbourhood, sip sangria on the L'Olivera Terrace under the shade of a century-old olive tree and bask in modern art at the main restaurant.

Above one of the city's most bustling districts, you are walking distance to the Gaudi-lined streets of Passeig de Gràcia, the markets and tapas restaurants of La Rambla and steps from decadent cafes, boutique shopping and dining.

title: Barcelona Eixample District Boutique Art Hotel with Rooftop Pool Bar & Daily Breakfast
description:
This ideally located hotel in the heart of Barcelona's Eixample District is an art lover's haven. Original works and lithographs by renowned artists such as Joan Miró and Miquel Barceló adorn the lobby while colourful corridors pay tribute to different contemporary artists.

Celebrate Barcelona's 300 days of sunshine with a swim in the rooftop pool, overlooking the honeycomb alcoves of the surrounding neighbourhood, sip sangria on the L'Olivera Terrace under the shade of a century-old olive tree and bask in modern art at the main restaurant.

Your location above one of the city's most bustling districts puts you within walking distance of the Gaudi-lined streets of Passeig de Gràcia, the markets and tapas restaurants of La Rambla and steps from decadent cafes, boutique shopping and dining.

title: Central Barcelona Gothic Quarter Glamour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Wine Hour
description:
Nestled in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, this five-star urban hotel is an ultra-refined hideaway perfectly situated to experience the best parts of Barcelona. Just steps away from La Rambla, you're surrounded by the city's finest boutique bars, restaurants and retail stores, putting indulgent cuisine and limitless shopping right on your doorstep. 

Visitors come here to experience Barcelona like a local. Opt to mingle at the rooftop bar, enjoy the nightly free-flow wine hour at the onsite drink venue GOT, savour Mediterranean meals at Fauna restaurant or lounge by the pool with views of the vibrant streets below. This glamorous hotel also offers an onsite spa, a yoga program and soundproof rooms, ensuring a restful recovery after days spent exploring the lively city.
location_description: Kimpton Vividora Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Carrer del Duc 15, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona 08002, Spain

title: Five-Star Luxury in the Heart of Barcelona
description: Awe-inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and world-revered cuisine: it’s all on offer in the Spanish seaside city of Barcelona, and you’re invited to stay right in the heart of the action at the top-rated, five-star The One Barcelona. Located in one of the city’s most exclusive neighbourhoods, this luxurious haven - complete with a stylish rooftop bar, is the perfect base from which to explore the city. Enjoy a guaranteed upgrade to a city-view room with daily a la carte breakfasts, a welcome drink each on arrival and a complimentary bottle of wine.

title: Award-Winning Escape in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter with City-View Rooftop Bar & Pool
description:
Ideally located in the Spanish seaside city of Barcelona, the award-winning H10 Madison will plunge you into early 20th-century elegance, as awe-inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and world-revered cuisine unfurl before you. Housed in a neoclassical building, within the intriguing lanes of the city's vibrant Gothic Quarter, this ultra-glamorous hotel is the perfect launchpad to explore this cosmopolitan city and embrace this picturesque part of Spain’s Catalonia region.

Come for the historic visual feast, award-winning service and world-class dining onsite, and stay for the rooftop plunge pool with breathtaking city views, its seasonal terrace bar and enviable location in one of Europe's favourite destinations.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy daily gourmet à la carte or buffet breakfast at ​​The Avenue Restaurant
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome drink each on arrival
- Find a complimentary welcome bottle of cava in your room on arrival

**Tripadvisor** **Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2021** Top 25 Most Saved Hotels - World

**Book with Confidence:** We work directly with our trusted partners and provide 24/7 customer service to ensure that no matter what happens, we’re here to help. If your escape is affected by Covid-19 restrictions, we will do our best to assist you with a date change or provide you with a Luxury Escapes credit for another Limited Time Lux Exclusive accommodation, tour or cruise offer, less any unrecoverable costs; excludes flights. [Find out more](https://luxuryescapes.com/escape-with-confidence)
offer_address: Carrer del Dr. Joaquim Pou, 2, 4-6, 08002 Barcelona, Spain

title: Extended by Popular Demand: Boutique Central Barcelona City Break with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover buzzing mercados, electric street art and iconic museums in the Catalan capital with a stay at this vibrant hotel. Located in the heart of Barcelona, next to Plaça Catalunya, this charming escape is steps away from world-class shopping on Passeig de Gracia, a handful of Gaudi's mind-blowing creations and legendary tapas spots that locals actually frequent.

Twenty One Terrace is where the rooftop magic happens, serving up 9th-floor views and golden-hour cocktails with the city stretching out beneath you. Downstairs, Moments Lounge Bar is your one-stop shop for all-day coffee, cosmopolitan cocktails and tempting tapas. This is your launchpad for enjoying Barcelona like a local.

title: Luxury Barcelona Escape with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Pool & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Five-star comforts surrounded by some of Barcelona's most iconic landmarks await at the boutique Ohla Eixample. Featuring a striking facade made of 1,000 pieces of carved ceramic, the hotel places you minutes from La Sagrada Familia, Casa Mila and Park Güell. The hotel itself is a treasure trove of elevated comforts, with a Michelin-starred restaurant onsite serving locally caught seafood sourced daily from the city’s fish markets. On sunny afternoons, head up to the rooftop, where a glorious infinity pool, bar and terrace promise fabulous views of the city's most famous sites.

Right outside the hotel's doors, you'll find a plethora of restaurants, shops and cafes - to be expected from the coolest neighbourhood in the world, as heralded by Time Out Magazine. When you aren't marvelling at the masterworks of Gaudi, your central location leaves you only minutes from Barceloneta Beach and the bustling Gothic Quarter.
offer_address: Carrer de Còrsega 289, L'Eixample 08008, Barcelona, Spain

title: Boutique Barcelona Glamour near Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Heated Infinity Pool
description:
Five-star comforts surrounded by some of Barcelona's most iconic landmarks await at this chic boutique hotel. The hotel places you minutes from Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Familia.

The hotel itself is a treasure trove of elevated comforts, with an exquisite restaurant onsite serving locally caught seafood sourced daily from the city’s fish markets. On sunny afternoons, head up to the rooftop, where a glorious heated infinity pool, bar and terrace promise fabulous views of the city's most famous sites.

Right outside the hotel's doors, you'll find a plethora of restaurants, shops and cafes - to be expected from the coolest neighbourhood in the world, as heralded by Time Out Magazine. When you aren't marvelling at the masterworks of Gaudi, your central location leaves you a stone's throw from La Pedrera and Passeig de Gracia.
offer_address: Carrer de Còrsega 289, L'Eixample 08008, Barcelona, Spain

title: Five-Star Escape in the Heart of Barcelona with Rooftop Pool, Gourmet Dinner & Daily Breakfast
description:
Find yourself in the heart of one of Spain's trendiest neighbourhoods with a five-star stay at Ocean Drive Barcelona - a city oasis that prides itself on unique style and personalised service. Located in the bustling Eixample district, moments from outstanding restaurants, high-end boutiques and must-see cultural sites, Ocean Drive Barcelona makes a striking statement on the city's hotel scene, confirmed by its Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2021 (placing it among the top 10% of hotels worldwide on the review site).

Enhanced by high-tech amenities, the sleek architecture and handpicked interiors create an ambience synonymous with the Mediterranean lifestyle. The sun-drenched rooftop pool and terrace are the perfect places to soak up skyline vistas with a cocktail in hand, while the generously sized Mediterranean-inspired rooms invite a restful siesta after mornings of exploration. Stick around for one of Ocean Drive Barcelona's luxe events or step out onto the pulsing streets to discover nearby attractions - from Gaudi's artwork and the Sagrada Familia to the emblematic main square, Plaça de Catalunya - only a short stroll away.

title: Chic Barcelona Modernist Escape on Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast
description:
Culture, awe-inspiring architecture, world-class art, history and delicious cuisine: it’s all on offer in the sparkling seaside city of Barcelona - and you're invited to stay in the heart of it all on the 'Spanish Champs-Elysees'. Housed in a 19th-century building with a stunning modernist facade, this boutique gem offers a collection of rooms decorated in a chic contemporary style with luxe amenities and designer furniture, and an elegant lounge bar in one of the best locations in the city. After taking in the city's history and culture, you're in the perfect place to enjoy the delicious tapas and trendy bars of L'eixample, as well as of the nearby burroughs of Gracia and the Gothic Quarter.

You won’t have to venture far from your room to embrace Barcelona’s cool vibes and rich history either. With its location on one of the city's most prominent streets, you'll find a collection of elite fashion ateliers and upscale shopping right outside your door. And the hotel is ideally situated a mere stone’s throw from Gaudi’s modernist masterpieces, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera, and only a 20-minute walk from the famous Sagrada Familia.

title: Boutique Barcelona Escape near Passeig de Gracia with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Pool & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Five-star comforts surrounded by some of Barcelona's most iconic landmarks await at the boutique Ohla Eixample. Featuring a striking facade made of 1,000 pieces of carved ceramic, the hotel places you minutes from La Pedrera, Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Familia.

The hotel itself is a treasure trove of elevated comforts, with a Michelin-starred restaurant onsite serving locally caught seafood sourced daily from the city’s fish markets. On sunny afternoons, head up to the rooftop, where a glorious infinity pool, bar and terrace promise fabulous views of the city's most famous sites.

Right outside the hotel's doors, you'll find a plethora of restaurants, shops and cafes - to be expected from the coolest neighbourhood in the world, as heralded by Time Out Magazine. When you aren't marvelling at the masterworks of Gaudi, your central location leaves you a stone's throw from Barceloneta Beach and the bustling Gothic Quarter.
offer_address: Carrer de Còrsega 289, L'Eixample 08008, Barcelona, Spain

title: Heritage Barcelona Retreat Seconds from Passeig de Gracia with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Learn of worlds past and craft new memories in the centre of vibrant Barcelona with a stay at H10 Urquinaona Plaza. Take it all in with the city at your fingertips - this contemporary escape sits between the Gothic Quarter and Dreta de l'Eixample, perfect for visiting iconic sites like La Sagrada Familia and Passeig de Gracia. Experience a warm welcome with a curated grazing basket, enjoy a complimentary buffet breakfast before a day of exploration or visit the rooftop where a refreshing plunge pool awaits.

Housed in a beautifully renovated 19th century building, the hotel seamlessly blends modern style with its storied past. From winding medieval streets to bustling beach promenades, discover the essence of Barcelona in this chic urban sanctuary.

title: Central Barcelona Glamour in the Gothic Quarter with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Wine Hour
description:
Poised above the boutique bars, restaurants and retail stores of the Gothic Quarter is the ultra-refined Kimpton Vividora Barcelona, an IHG Hotel. This five-star urban hideaway is where visitors come to experience Barcelona like a local - whether mingling at the rooftop bar, enjoying GOT Coffee & Cocktail’s nightly free-flow wine hour, gathering for a Mediterranean meal at Fauna Restaurant or perched by the pool overlooking the buzzing streets below.

This glamorous space is just minutes' away from La Rambla, putting indulgent cuisine and limitless shopping on your doorstep. Plus, the onsite spa, yoga program and soundproof rooms ensure a restful recovery after days on your feet.
location_description: Kimpton Vividora Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Carrer del Duc 15, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona 08002, Spain

title: Barcelona’s Most Glamorous New Hotel
description: Experience the culture, romance and dreamy architecture of Spain’s coolest city, Barcelona. Spend three nights at the city’s hottest new hotel, H10 Madison, and enjoy daily breakfasts, welcome drinks on arrival and a bottle of Spanish sparkling wine.
offer_address: Carrer del Dr. Joaquim Pou, 2-4-6, 08002 Barcelona, Spain

title: Boutique Central Barcelona Escape with Daily Breakfast, Rooftop Pool & Sauna
description:
Wake from dream-filled siestas to wander Barcelona with a boutique stay at this central hotel. Placed in the heart of the action, this stylish retreat is moments from high-end shopping and dining along Passeig de Gracia, and within easy reach of marvels like Park Güell and Gaudí’s architectural creations. Between rounds of moreish pintxos, indulge in Mediterranean dishes at the hotel's Sintonia Restaurant.

Spend relaxed afternoons overlooking Barcelona from the rooftop pool or watch the sun turn shades of orange with a cocktail in hand at Gallery Rooftop. Explore the historic Gothic Quarter, the bustling Las Ramblas and the stunning Sagrada Familia before retreating to the hotel and rejuvenating with a sauna session.
offer_address: Carrer del Rosselló, 249, L'eixample, Barcelona 08008, Spain

title: Stylish Barcelona Marina Stay with Rooftop Pool & Bar Overlooking Olympic Village
description: Seek sophistication and luxury with a rejuvenating stay at H10 Marina Barcelona. Set in the heart of the buzzing Olympic Village, boasting waterfront dining and a striking seafront promenade, the hotel is perfectly perched to admire views of the city from the hotel’s chic Skyline Terrace, a vibrant rooftop bar and pool area. After days spent exploring Barcelona, relax with a treatment at Despacio Spa Centre, along with curated dishes and tasty drinks at Dionissos Restaurant.
offer_address: Av. Bogatell, 64-68,  E-08005-Olympic Village, Barcelona, Spain

title: Five-Star Barcelona Glamour with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
description: Five-star comforts surrounded by some of Barcelona's most iconic landmarks await at the boutique Ohla Eixample. Featuring a striking façade made of 1,000 pieces of carved ceramic, the hotel places you minutes from La Sagrada Familia, Casa Mila and Park Güell. Right outside the hotel's doors, you'll find a plethora of restaurants, shops and cafés - to be expected from the bustling Eixample district. The hotel itself is a treasure trove of creature comforts, with a Michelin-starred restaurant onsite serving locally-caught seafood sourced daily from the city’s fish markets. On sunny afternoons, head up to the rooftop, where a glorious infinity pool and terrace promise fabulous views of the city's most famous sites.

title: Five-Star Luxury in the Heart of Barcelona with Rooftop Pool
description:
Find yourself in the heart of one of Spain's trendiest neighbourhoods with a five-star stay at Ocean Drive Barcelona - a city oasis that prides itself on unique style and personalised service. Located in the bustling Eixample district, moments from outstanding restaurants, high-end boutiques and must-see cultural sites, Ocean Drive Barcelona makes a striking statement on the city's hotel scene, confirmed by its Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2021 (placing it among the top 10% of hotels worldwide on the review site).

Enhanced by high-tech amenities, the sleek architecture and handpicked interiors create an ambience synonymous with the Mediterranean lifestyle. The sun-drenched rooftop pool and terrace are the perfect places to soak up skyline vistas with a cocktail in hand, while the generously sized Mediterranean-inspired rooms invite a restful siesta after mornings of exploration. Stick around for one of Ocean Drive Barcelona's luxe events or step out onto the pulsing streets to discover nearby attractions - from Gaudi's artwork and the Sagrada Familia to the emblematic main square, Plaça de Catalunya - only a short stroll away.

title: Century-Old Barcelona Modernist Suites on Passeig de Gracia with Rooftop Terrace & Spa
description:
Located along the bustling Passeig de Gracia high street, this century-old art nouveau manor couldn't be better placed to discover the grandeur of Barcelona. Each of only six suites boasts heritage-listed frescoes, private terraces with city views, a personal assistant service and sumptuous living spaces dripping in modernist features.

Savour authentic Catalan cuisine at the nearby Mercat de la Boqueria or explore the city's famed architectural landmarks, including Gaudi's Sagrada Familia and Park Guell. When evening falls, head to the rooftop terrace for a refreshing drink under the stars.

title: Five-Star Heritage Barcelona Escape with Rooftop Terrace & Mayan-Themed Spa
description:
Walk in the footsteps of Gaudi, indulge in fine wines and tapas, and slip into unparalleled relaxation in a Mayan-themed spa within Hotel Claris 5*GL Monument & Spa. This boutique Spanish haven is a member of the renowned Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.

Set behind an original neoclassic facade from the 19th century and located within moments of Diagonal Avenue, Passeig de Gràcia, Plaça de Catalunya, Las Ramblas, and the historic Gothic Quarter, this elegantly refurbished hotel makes for a dream launchpad into Barcelona's culture and history. While outside is a feast for the senses, Hotel Claris 5*GL Monument & Spa more than holds its own. While the morning away with a spot of shopping in the Passeig de Gràcia boutiques before an afternoon spent perusing the hotel's museum. Unwind in one of the region's best spas, as listed in the Telegraph 2021, sip handcrafted cocktails on the breathtaking rooftop terrace and continue your culinary education in the two gourmet restaurants, La Terraza del Claris and Os-Kuro.
offer_address: Carrer de Pau Claris, 150, 08009 Barcelona Barcelona 08009 Spain

title: Oceanfront Barcelona Oasis near Barceloneta Beach with Rooftop Pool
description:
Explore the best of Barcelona from this five-star Sofitel base, ideally located just steps from Barceloneta Beach and a short stroll from the Gothic Quarter. Whether you're visiting for work or play, unwind in vibrant, contemporary rooms, take in sweeping city views from the rooftop pool or recharge in the fitness centre.

Savour locally inspired cuisine at TENDIEZ Tapas Bar & Restaurant, alongside cocktails on a chic terrace. With direct access to Barcelona’s cultural heart, buzzing beach life and seamless transport connections, Sofitel Barcelona Skipper is your stylish escape for soaking up the city’s iconic energy.
offer_address: Av del Litoral 10, HB004318, Barcelona 08005, Spain

title: Modern Barcelona Escape near La Sagrada Familia
description: Lap up endless stretches of pristine beach and be within minutes of the spectacular La Sagrada Familia at Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel. Endeavour to explore Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and peruse the same streets as Pablo Picasso, admire the unmistakable architecture of Antoni Gaudi and browse the colourful La Boqueria emporium for deli treats. Enjoy a drink at the hotel’s Express Bar and skip down to Port Olimpic for after-hours fun.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express: Barcelona - City 22@, an IHG Hotel

title: Barcelona City Break Overlooking Plaça de Catalunya with Rooftop Terrace & Swimming Pool
description:
Stay in the beating heart of Barcelona at H10 Metropolitan, where you'll be overlooking the city’s most central point Plaça de Catalunya. The hotel has recently undergone a complete renovation led by the prestigious interior designer Lazaro Rosa-Violan. Make the most of fabulous facilities including a rooftop terrace with sun loungers and a swimming pool overlooking Plaça Catalunya and Tibidabo, plus Edén Bar and Terrace for cocktails and light bites and hearty breakfasts at the stylish Kitchen Restaurant.

When exploring Barcelona, enjoy having the best of the city at your fingertips. Famous sites including Las Rambla and the Old Town's Gothic Quarter are all located within a five-minute walk. The Plaça de Catalunya station is a one-minute walk from the hotel, making getting to and from your next adventure easy. Passeig de Gràcia is located just a two-minute walk away and here's where you'll find the city's glitziest boutiques and restaurants, as well as Antoni Gaudí’s famous Casa Batlló and Casa Milà buildings. When you're ready for some fun in the sun, Barcelona's beaches are within walking distance.

title: Five-Star Barcelona Luxury with City-View Rooftop Bar & Pool
description:
Awe-inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and world-revered cuisine - it’s all on offer at five-star The One Barcelona, located in the heart of the city. This luxurious haven - complete with a stylish rooftop bar - is the perfect base for exploring this Spanish seaside destination. From the modernist masterpieces of Antoni Gaudí, like La Sagrada Familia and Casa Batlló, to the Picasso museum, Barcelona is a treasure trove of art and architecture. Lose yourself in the medieval streets of the Gothic Quarter, where trendy bars spill out onto the pavements, walk the famous tree-lined La Rambla with its many shops and eateries, and soak up the Spanish sunshine with a sangria in hand at a beachfront bar.

This stunning hotel is rated among the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, and it’s not hard to see why. Located near the upscale shopping street of Passeig de Gràcia (known as the Spanish Champs-Élysées), this five-star hotel is the perfect launchpad for city adventures. Onsite, you'll find a restaurant, 24-hour fitness centre, and luxurious spa. To end each day, guests can soak up panoramic city views from Mood rooftop bar with a cocktail in hand or plunge into the rooftop pool, where the views stretch across the city to the sea.

title: Boutique Escape in the Heart of Barcelona with Welcome Drink & Dining Credit
description:
Experience the magic of Barcelona with a stay at H10 Montcada, boasting an address on one of the city's most prominent streets. Housed within a neoclassical building in the popular Gothic Quarter, H10 Montcada is your personal invitation to discover the charms of the capital of Spain's beautiful Catalonia region. Right opposite this glamourous hotel, you'll find the world-famous Cathedral of Barcelona, with the trendy neighbourhood of El Born and the famed Picasso Museum just minutes away.

Turn the dial up on your Barcelona trip with H10 Montcada's luxurious facilities, including a fabulous rooftop bar with front-row views of the historic cathedral and city skyline. The rooftop even has a jacuzzi and sunbathing area, where you can work on your tan. Try classic Mediterranean dishes at the onsite restaurant or kick back and relax at the aptly named Travellers Bar.

One of the most popular boutique hotels in Barcelona and literally minutes from all the major attractions, H10 Montcada reminds you of the golden age of architecture and design. Having earned the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice seal of approval, the hotel offers modern rooms with individual climate control, Nespresso coffee machines and plush double or twin bedding.

title: Modern Barcelona Stay Near Marina & Gothic Quarter
description: Immerse yourself in luxury in one of Europe's most storied cities with a stay at Serras Hotel Barcelona. Once home to Pablo Picasso's first studio, the building opens to stunning seafront views and enjoys an ideal position among the city's most noteworthy sites. Breathe in the glorious Mediterranean breeze while relaxing on the rooftop, or treat yourself to the creations of Michelin-starred chef, Marc Gascons, at the hotel’s own Informal Restaurant.

title: Five-Star Barcelona Escape with Iconic Rooftop Pool & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Coined 'the hotel with a thousand eyes', Ohla Barcelona is instantly recognisable by its striking facade: the neo-classical design has been hijacked by sculptor Frederic Amat, who pinned hundreds of ceramic eyes on the hotel's front. Found in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, just five minutes from La Rambla and the famous Boqueria market, the five-star design hotel couldn't be more conveniently located with an abundance of restaurants, shops, bars and cafés right outside its door.

The extravagant tone set by the exterior continues throughout your stay, with red-hot facilities ensuring an experience that's equal parts comfortable and exciting. There's a clear-sided rooftop swimming pool, a Michelin-starred French restaurant from Romain Fornell, and an iconic rooftop terrace listed among the best rooftop bars in Barcelona by The Rooftop Guide, with a cocktail bar shaking up excellent concoctions and aperitifs.

title: Barcelona City Break near Montjuic with Tapas Restaurant & Bar
description: Experience Spain's metropolitan culture at Barcelona Gran Via Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel, placed conveniently next to the Fira exhibition centre. Enjoy tapas at onsite restaurant Àcota, peruse the wine and cocktail list for pre-dinner tipples, then hit the town. With the Espanya metro station mere steps from the hotel, the historic centre of Barcelona and famous La Rambla - with historic architecture, markets and entertainment - are easily within reach.
location_description: Barcelona Gran Via Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 322 Gran Via De Las Corts Catalanes, Barcelona, Spain, 8004

title: Contemporary Barcelona Eixample Escape with Peaceful Pool & Two Bars
description: Live luxe in the heart of Barcelona's chic Eixample district at Hotel Balmes 4*. This architectural gem, a fusion of modern design and Catalan heritage, is a stone's throw from Gaudi's masterpieces and high-end boutiques. Indulge in cocktails on the terrace or surrounded by rare art at B Bar before dining at Balmes Restaurant. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's tranquil private garden and pool, a rare urban oasis in this vibrant city.

title: Stylish Central City Barcelona Escape with Rooftop Pool
description:
Trace the footsteps of Gaudí and Picasso, feast on fabulous Catalan cuisine, hit the beach, dance all night, and unearth the many wonders of Barcelona with a luxe stay at Sir Victor. Located just steps from Passeig de Gràcia and a few doors down from Gaudí’s masterpiece Casa Milà this stylish hotel is also ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. 

Inside this expansive haven, you'll find modern interiors and a rooftop pool and bar where you can soak up with views of Gaudí’s Casa Milà and La Sagrada Família or grab a bite to eat at the critically acclaimed restaurant, MR PORTER. The beautifully designed spa facilities operated by Signature are nothing short of superb, and if you overindulge (who wouldn't?), the state-of-the-art, high-performance gym is the perfect place to sweat it out.

vendor_name: HOTEL INDIGO BARCELONA GRANVIA PLAZA ESPANA
title: Stylish Barcelona Escape in Eixample District with Bar & Outdoor Pool
description: Ideally located in the seaside city of Barcelona, in the heart of the Eixample District, the Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya, an IHG Hotel, will plunge you into sophisticated modernism, as inspiring architecture, culture, art, history and cuisine unfurl before you. Come for the flamboyant Modernista visual feast and welcoming service, and stay for the outdoor pool, seasonal cocktail bar and its enviable location in Spain’s renowned Catalonia region.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 629, 08010 Barcelona, Spain

title: Five-Star Barcelona Luxury at Spain's #1 Hotel with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the vibrancy of Barcelona from the Best Hotel in Spain and Portugal, as voted by the 2020 Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards: the five-star Almanac Barcelona. Boasting an address to impress just steps from Spain's answer to the Champs-Elysées - the prominent Passeig de Gràcia - this sumptuous hotel takes you to the heart of the action in style and luxury. Wake up in one of the beautifully styled rooms and immerse yourself in the pulsing streets of Barcelona. Discover Gaudi’s masterpieces, Casa Batlló and Casa Milà, take a five-minute stroll to reach the bustling Las Ramblas boulevard and the historic streets of the old city, taste tapas with locals, then retreat to the hotel’s rooftop bar to toast your five-star city escape.

Styled by local designer Jaime Beriestain, the hotel showcases contemporary décor with a wealth of textures and exquisite living spaces. Its long list of impeccable facilities includes a wellness centre, spa and the acclaimed, plant-focused restaurant VIRENS, serving exquisite dishes such as artichokes with candied flowers and Chinese cabbage dumplings (there's organic meat and fish too for the carnivores). The jewel in the hotel’s crown? The majestic, multitiered rooftop terrace, which offers spectacular views over Barcelona’s skyline, a sparkling pool and a laidback bar, Azimuth. Visit for yourself and discover why this stunning hotel is rated among Tripadvisor's top 1% worldwide, earning it a spot in the top luxury hotels in Spain at the Travellers' Choice 2020 Best of the Best awards.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Indulgent **daily à la carte breakfast** served in the elegant surroundings of VIRENS restaurant
- A **welcome cocktail, glass of wine or sparkling on arrival** to celebrate your city escape (for stays of 2+ nights)
- **Complimentary upgrade to the next room category**, subject to availability (for stays of 4+ nights, excludes Almanac Suite)
- **EUR25 food and drinks credit per room** to spend at the hotel’s restaurant and rooftop bar (for stays of 6+ nights)

**Travelling with kids?** Check out the Family Upgrade for two adults and one child (aged 11 years and under).

**Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Best of the Best 2020** Top Luxury Hotels - Spain
offer_address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 619, 621, 08007 Barcelona, Spain

title: Five-Star Barcelona Retreat with Rooftop Views of Gothic Cathedral
description: Escape to the alluring seaside city of Barcelona with a lavish stay at the Kimpton Vividora Barcelona, an IHG Hotel, beautifully located to overlook the famed Gothic Quarter. Experience the city like a local as you explore the narrow streets surrounding the hotel, shop at the finest boutiques, and discover a multitude of trendy bars and restaurants. When you're ready to escape the vibrant city, enjoy a cocktail and tapas at the Terraza De Vivi rooftop bar overlooking the Cathedral of Barcelona.
location_description: Kimpton Vividora Barcelona, an IHG Hotel

title: Barcelona Five-Star Boutique Stay on Las Ramblas with Rooftop Pool, Bar & Restaurant
description: Right in the heart of Barcelona’s vibrant Las Ramblas district, Hotel Bagués promises five-star luxury and classic-meets-modern comforts. Formerly a jewellery workshop,  it now shines as a boutique hotel, with a stunning rooftop pool offering panoramic city views its prized gem. Explore the iconic Gothic Quarter, the bustling Boqueria Market or the world-renowned Picasso Museum, and return to enjoy a drink in the intimate bar or a cocktail and snack poolside on the open-air terrace.

title: Award-Winning Barcelona Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drinks
description:
Culture, awe-inspiring architecture, world-class art, history and delicious cuisine: it’s all on offer in the Spanish seaside city of Barcelona - and you are invited to stay right in the heart of the action at the boutique Hotel Sixtytwo. The hotel is rated among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, and it’s easy to see why. Housed in a 19th-century building with a stunning modernist façade, this boutique gem offers a collection of modern rooms with luxe amenities, beautiful designer furniture and an elegant cocktail bar in one of the best locations in the city.

You won’t have to venture far from your room to embrace Barcelona’s cool vibes and rich history. The hotel is ideally placed on one of the most prominent streets in the city, Passeig de Gràcia - known as the Spanish Champs-Elysées - making this the perfect launchpad for your explorations. Step outside the hotel's doors and find yourself a stone’s throw from Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Batlló, Casa Milà and La Pedrera, bustling Plaza de Catalunya and some of Barcelona’s best boutique shops, cool bars and restaurants - city escapes don’t get much better than this.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights/packages)**

- Fuel city exploration with **deluxe daily continental breakfast**
- Enjoy a **welcome drink on arrival**
- **Upgrade to a Superior Room**, subject to availability (Interior Rooms only, for stays of 4+ nights)

**Travelling with kids?** Check out the Family Room for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under)

**Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2021** Top 25 Hotels - Spain

title: Suburban Barcelona Stopover next to Grand Prix Circuit and Mediterranean Highway
description: Whether you prefer speed or relaxation, find your holiday pace with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Barcelona - Montmeló, an IHG Hotel. Ideal for automobile lovers, the hotel neighbours the Circuit De Barcelona-Catalunya racetrack as well as the Autopista AP-7, which offers great access for those on a French-Spanish road trip. Fuel your day the right way with a hearty breakfast in the hotel’s lobby each morning and settle into the evening with a refreshing drink from the bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona - Montmeló, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Pol. Ind. Can Gordi, Cami de Can Gordi, Carrer de Can Catala, 15, 08403 Granollers, Barcelona, Spain

title: Boutique Barcelona Stay Near Gothic Quarter with Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
description: Become immersed in the heart of Barcelona at the chic H10 Montcada, a boutique hotel exuding timeless elegance. Perfectly situated in the Gothic Quarter, this hotel is a stone's throw from the iconic Las Ramblas, the Picasso Museum, and the awe-inspiring Barcelona Cathedral. Indulge in the city's finest tapas around the city before retreating to the hotel's rooftop terrace to sip cocktails against the backdrop of a breathtaking cityscape.

title: Sophisticated Central Barcelona Escape with Rooftop Pool Bar
description: Step off Barcelona’s most luxurious avenue, Passeig de Gracia, and into a world of sophistication with a stay at Granados 83. The hotel’s immaculately designed interiors feature a striking collection of original art from across Asia, with rooms surrounding an interior courtyard covered by magnificent glass roofing. Exuding style in all aspects from the modern restaurant to the sparkling pool and rooftop bar, you'll savour looking out over central Barcelona with your favourite cocktail in hand.

title: Five-Star Barcelona Escape on Passeig de Gràcia with Six World-Class Restaurants & Bars
description: Stay in the beating heart of Barcelona at the five-star Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona, located along Passeig de Gràcia, the most exclusive shopping boulevard in the city. Experience incredible dining and handcrafted cocktails in a trendy setting at six world-class restaurants and bars onsite (including a rooftop Mediterranean restaurant). Meanwhile, the onsite spa offers relaxing spa treatments, a 12-metre spa lap pool, an Oriental steam room and a fully equipped fitness centre for all your health and wellness needs.

vendor_name: Grand Hotel Central - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
title: Contemporary Barcelona Retreat near Cathedral with Infinity Pool & Rooftop Terrace
description:
Unlock the secrets of Barcelona's enchanting Old Town with an indulgent stay right in the centre of it all. Grand Hotel Central's design combines history and character with an inviting and cutting-edge decor by London design studio Sagrada, with a stylish rooftop bar, restaurant and pool area overlooking the bustling city.

You can go from Mediterranean tapas to sun-kissed cocktails or take a dip in the sparkling rooftop infinity pool as you please. Offering delectable Spanish cuisine and rooftop DJ sets, take in the city's lively atmosphere while watching the sunset, or treat yourself at the onsite spa before discovering all of the city's delights.
offer_address: Via Laietana 30, Ciutat Vella, Barcelona 08003, Spain

title: Five-Star Barcelona Escape with Serene Spa & Rooftop Terrace
description: InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel combines contemporary design and five-star comfort for guests seeking a slice of seaside Catalonia. Lose yourself in the historic city, discovering works of great artists like Picasso or sightseeing and shopping at Passeig de Gracia. Savour fine dining at Quirat or Arrel restaurants, find a moment of relaxation at the spa or soak up stunning views of the Barcelona skyline and Montjuïc Castle from the rooftop terrace.
offer_address: Avenida de Rius i Taulet, 1-3, 08004, Barcelona
